home.title: QuoDev
home.subtitle: by Gerard Solanes
home.text: We are the full-stack developers who deliver impactful web solutions that resonate in the digital world

projects.xproof: A user-friendly React PWA that captures math equation photos, expertly detects errors, pinpoints mistake locations, and offers targeted feedback, empowering users to learn and enhance problem-solving skills efficiently.
projects.soundtribe: A Node, Express, and MongoDB-powered social platform that unites musicians and fans, creating 'tribes', sharing music, concert dates, and engaging with posts in a uniquely tribal-themed environment, celebrating artistic connections.
projects.console: A Javascript-based game with canvas, HTML, and CSS, featuring immersive animations, parallax effects, and an original soundtrack, keeping players engaged with a competitive scoreboard system for endless entertainment. Graphic content from Firewatch and pixel.io
projects.select: < select a project to be shown here />

about.title: ABOUT ME
about.text1: I am a physicist, a teacher and a full-stack developer with a unique blend of
about.text4: skills. Specialising in the JavaScript MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js) and WORDPRESS, I bring my passion for innovation and problem-solving to every project.
about.text5: Driven by my eagerness for coding and excellence, I deliver engaging, visually striking, and functional web experiences that resonate with users and elevate the clients' brand presence.

contact.title: CONTACT
contact.text: Tell us about your project, arrange a meeting with us and let's start creating together.
